sentences.english: Paper is one of the most popular handbag making materials.
sentences.chinese: 铜版纸是一种最普及的手提袋制作材料。

sentences.english: For her part, she insists touch-screens will soon be owned by everyone.
sentences.chinese: 对于她来说，她坚信触摸屏会很快普及。

sentences.english: To make defence education universal and foster such education is the common responsibility of the whole society.
sentences.chinese: 普及和加强国防教育是全社会的共同责任。

sentences.english: Instant communication is Chinese Internet most one of all-pervading network application.
sentences.chinese: 即时通讯是中国互联网最为普及的网络应用之一。

sentences.english: It was about as popular as a root canal.(Speaking of the bank bailout)
sentences.chinese: 它就像牙根管一样普及。

sentences.english: She says she is glad to see that the ukulele is gaining popularity.
sentences.chinese: 她说，她很高兴地看到，四弦琴是日益普及。

sentences.english: CT Ststem was a large - seal medical equipment and reached different hospital.
sentences.chinese: CT机是我国各级医院逐渐普及的一种大型医疗设备。

sentences.english: Hair drier and electric iron is popular in our life.
sentences.chinese: 吹风机与电熨斗已经成为普及的居家电器。

sentences.english: Physical distribution is common today. Even small cities and counties can receive goods on time.
sentences.chinese: 现在货流已经很普及，小的市县也可以及时收到货物。

sentences.english: The fact that they are so popular proves that they are useful and convenient.
sentences.chinese: 手机如此普及的事实证明了它们的实用和方便。

sentences.english: This assess standard has achieved remarkable results after its wide spread and application at the whole Inc.
sentences.chinese: 经在全公司普及推广运用，取得了显著效果。

sentences.english: With the development of science, computer increasingly popular.
sentences.chinese: 随着科学的发展，电脑越来越普及化。

sentences.english: In the seventh part, the white paper stresses the importance of the "Popularization and Education of the Law."
sentences.chinese: 白皮书第七章强调了法律普及和法制教育的重要性。

sentences.english: There is a necessity to universalize elementary education.
Adhering technical innovation and popularization of science is the only way to make enterprise powerful.
sentences.chinese: 坚持科技创新和科学普及是企业发展壮大的必由之路。

sentences.english: We have a long way to go to reach the goal of universal access to diagnostic testing.
sentences.chinese: 要实现普及诊断检测的目标，我们还有很长的路要走。

definition: to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to rise/to spring up/to burgeon/to be aroused/to come into vogue
to be in vogue/to be prevalent
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to attach importance to sth/to value
flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding/still growing strong/on the up
Xinxing county in Yunfu 雲浮|云浮[Yun2 fu2], Guangdong/Xinxing or Hsinhsing district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
(of markets, industries, infectious diseases etc) rising/emerging/in the ascendant
to emerge to meet a historic destiny (idiom)/to arise at an opportune time/able to take advantage of an opportunity/to rise to the occasion
